KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: In the meantime I need to rid the surrounding area of some of these Drudges.
In the meantime I need to rid the surrounding area of some of these Drudges.
In the meantime I need to rid the surrounding area of some of these Drudges.
In the meantime I need to rid the surrounding area of some of these Drudges.
In the meantime I need to rid the surrounding area of some of these Drudges.

KillTask.TaskName: Armoredillo Hunting: Lost City of Neftet
KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: If you will kill 30 of the armoredillos within the canyon walls or up on the plateaus, I will reward you for your help.

KillTask.TaskName: Golem Hunting: Lost City of Neftet
KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: If you will kill 15 of the golems within the canyon walls or up on the plateaus, I will reward you for your assistance.

KillTask.TaskName: Mumiyah Hunting: Lost City of Neftet
KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: If you will kill 30 of the Mumiyah within the canyon walls or up on the plateaus, I will reward you for your assistance.

KillTask.TaskName: Reedshark Hunting: Lost City of Neftet
KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: If you will kill 30 of the reedsharks within the canyon walls or up on the plateaus, I will reward you for your aid to the crown.
Kill 20 Gurog Soldiers and I will reward you for your efforts.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Well done! Always a pleasure to meet someone who shares my hatred of these beasts.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Kill 20 Gurog Minions and I will reward you for your efforts.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Well done! Ugly creatures aren't they? Glad to be rid of them.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Kill 20 Gurog Henchmen and I will reward you for your efforts.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Well done! Hardly a scratch on you as well, you truly are a great warrior.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Kill 20 Snow Tuskers and I will reward you for your efforts.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Fantastic job! Those mutated beasts need to be put down, every kill helps.

KillTask.TaskName: Snow Tusker Kill Task (Snow Tusker Warrior)
KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Kill 20 Snow Tusker Warriors and I will reward you for your efforts.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Well done! Their coats remind me of the creature know as a wolf back on Ispar.

KillTask.TaskName: Snow Tusker Kill Task (Snow Tusker Leader)
KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Kill 10 Snow Tusker Leaders and I will reward you for your efforts.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Amazing that you survived, those tusks can spear a man all the way through.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Kill 10 of these Frozen Dreads and I will reward you for your efforts.
Kill 20 Frozen Wights and I will reward you for your efforts.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Those creatures send chills down my spine.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Kill 15 Shadow Flyers and I will reward you for your efforts.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Well done! That should at least keep the corruption from spreading any further.

KillTask.TaskName: Aun Golem Hunters: Mud Golem Sludge Lord
Aun Golem Hunters: Copper Golem Kingpin
Aun Golem Hunters: Glacial Golem Margrave
Aun Golem Hunters: Magma Golem Exarch
Aun Golem Hunters: Coral Golem Viceroy
Aun Golem Hunters: Platinum Golem Mountain King
High Priest of T'thuun Kill Task
Spectral Blade and Claw Kill Task
Umbral Rift Kill Task Umbral Rifts
